turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. Getting a little hungry here. Can I order a pickup from Bella Luna pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Going to get to two large pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One with pepperoni and extra cheese and the other with sausage and both with thick crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: 2 large thick crust pizzas. one with pepperoni and extra cheese, the other with sausage. correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long till it's ready if I order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they should be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's awesome. Go ahead and order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: all set, your pizzas will be ready for pickup soon.
